message.entry: ''DataVariables'' parameter is only supported for table inputs.
''DataVariables'' function handle must return a logical scalar.
Method argument not supported when ''OutlierLocations'' parameter is specified.
''MinNumOutliers'' value must be a nonnegative integer.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Name-value arguments must occur in pairs.

The second input must be ''median'', ''mean'', ''movmedian'', ''movmean'', ''quartiles'', ''grubbs'', ''gesd'', ''DataVariables'', ''MinNumOutliers'', ''OutlierLocations'', ''SamplePoints'', or ''ThresholdFactor''.
Invalid data type. Table variables must be double or single column vectors of real values.
''{0}'' value must be a table containing logical variables with the same sizes and names as the table variables to operate on.
Variable names specified by ''DataVariables'' must be present in ''{0}''.
Variable names specified by ''{0}'' must be present in the input table.
Dimension argument must be the constant 1 for code generation when first argument is a table.
''movmean'' and ''movmedian'' methods are not supported for code generation when ''SamplePoints'' are of type datetime or duration.
